string.value: Lala is thrilled to hear that Blake is finally making his debut and happily agrees to help with the costumes. Assist #bLala#k to prepare the costumes.
Collect the costumes and props for Blake's debut performance and take them over to #bLala#k.
#bLala#k was thrilled to hear about Blake's debut and asked you to give her some time to think about which costumes would be best for the performance.
Hey! You're back! I've decided on Blake's costume. But I'm a student, so I don't have much free time to work on the costume. Can you help me collect the materials I need?

I had an amazing Fedora in mind for Blake's costume. I also need a Wig to transform him into a star, and...what else... Oh, yes, a cute Bunny Suit! If you go to the 5th-6th floor of Kerning Square, you'll see a lot of Mannequins wearing those items. I need costumes for Blake's backup dancers, too.
Please bring me #b50 Kid Mannequin's Bunny Suits, 50 Female Mannequin's Wigs, and 50 Male Mannequin's Fedoras#k.
Blake can't have a debut performance without the right costume. This is important!
Woohoo! Have you brought the materials? Let me see, let me see. I'm so excited!

Eeeek, they're wonderful! Everything from Bunny Suits to Fedoras! It's everything I could've asked for! But...something is missing. Argh, I can't quite figure it out. Could you talk to me in a little bit? I need to think this through.
Please bring me #b50 Kid Mannequin's Bunny Suits, 50 Female Mannequin's Wigs, and 50 Male Mannequin's Fedoras#k. You'll be able to find them easily on the 5th-6th floor of Kerning Square.
